ship_logs.details: Primary navigation systems functioning normally. All sensors operational.
Unidentified ship detected at coordinates 127.45.89. Configuration unknown. Attempting communication...
Unable to establish contact with unknown vessel. Recommend evasive maneuvers.

silk_star_logs.content: Company denied request for additional fuel. Forced to recalculate route through unstable sector. The onboard Android is undergoing maintenance. So the jump will have to be controlled manually.
Entering hyperspace. Seven hours to jump exit.
Severe hull vibrations. Navigation systems malfunctioning. I'm picking up a beacon bearing
That can't be right. I don't...

cryo_protocol.title: ACTIVATE_CRYO.PROTOCOL
cryo_protocol.content:
To sleep is to serve.
To serve is to become.
To become is to dissolve.
To dissolve is to rise.

:: CRYO_CYCLE: INITIATING ::
